abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32470119, pmid32479682, pmid32478957, pmid32478445, pmid32478951, pmid32479113, pmid32478500, pmid32470046, pmid32476600, pmid32479162, pmid32476228, pmid32478853, pmid32478558, pmid32479239, pmid32476594, pmid32476261, pmid32470153, pmid32478961, pmid32478539, pmid32469504, pmid32478396, pmid32479680, pmid32478540, pmid32476163, pmid32478562, pmid32476308, pmid32478472, pmid32476574, pmid32478544, pmid32478549, pmid32470120, pmid32479411, pmid32478398, pmid32476080, pmid32478551, pmid32478565, pmid32478959, pmid32476175, pmid32476306
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.06.03
